meanings.definition: A store where medicinal drugs are dispensed.
meanings.sent1: I went to the pharmacy to pick up my prescription.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacy on the corner is always busy with customers.
meanings.sent3: The pharmacy had a sale on band-aids, so I bought a hundred!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a pharmacy, always ready to heal any sadness.
meanings.sent5: The pharmacy glowed with the promise of health and wellness.

meanings.definition: The science or practice of preparing and dispensing medicinal drugs.
meanings.sent1: Studying pharmacy involves learning about different medications.
meanings.sent2: Pharmacy requires precision to ensure the right dosage for patients.
meanings.sent3: The pharmacy class had a lab where they mixed colorful liquids.
meanings.sent4: In her hands, knowledge of pharmacy became a powerful tool for healing.
meanings.sent5: The secrets of pharmacy whispered through the halls of the university.
